latest_changelog.zh_cn:
- **农田将支持至多四季轮作，且支持休耕时自动调整农田**
- **农田将能够适配更多特殊作物，目前已作tag兼容的有农夫乐事相关/甜浆果/森罗物语:厨房**
- 农夫AI强化，他现在会工作的更有效率
- 本次修改内容非常繁杂，此处只是简单介绍，详情见CurseForge/Modrinth主页视频和文件的更新日志
latest_changelog.en_us: - **Fields now support up to four-season crop rotation and auto-adjust when resting.**- **Farmland now supports more special crops**, currently tag-compatible with Farmer’s Delight, Sweet Berries, and Kaleidoscope Cookery.- Farmer AI improved for **higher work efficiency**.- This update is extensive; this is only a brief summary. See the video and full changelog on the CurseForge/Modrinth page for details.
